projects.name: Photography Portfolio
projects.short: My Portfolio Website to showcase my pictures
projects.description: My Portfolio Website for showing off my photography is written in Typescript, Next.js and Tailwindcss. The Website as well as backend are hosted on Vercel, whilst the data is store in a MongoDB Atlas Database. The Pictures are prepared for being served with an AWS Lambda Function, and then stored in an AWS S3 Bucket.

projects.name: Macro-pad
projects.short: Self designed Macro-pad using a ESP32 Microcontroller and touchscreen.
projects.description: The Macro-Pad is a group project started in school and continued individually later on. The device utilizes a ESP32-C3 Microcontroller to parse inputs and display commands passed from the host side. The device utilizes 3 rotary encoder and a TFT Touchscreen for inputs and displaying information to the user. All components are mounted on a custom PCB mounted in a 3D printed case, both designed in Autodesk Fusion. The software on the client is written in C++ and designed to allow the user to write their own software to control it.
